title: Canyonlands National Park: Education
body: A "Candy-Land" of Learning Want to explore a rainbow of rocks, discover amazing desert animals, or raft a wild river? Canyonlands offers diverse learning adventures for your students, both near and far.   Download lesson plans to bring Canyonlands into your classroom or plan your own field trip to the park.                 Headed to Canyonlands? Need help planning a field trip to the park? Click here for activity ideas and park information. Read More        C.C.O.E. Canyon Country Outdoor Education connects K-6 students from Grand and San Juan counties with the national parks in their backyards. Read More        Inside Canyonlands These short videos dig into a range of topics... many of which you're likely to experience first-hand when you visit the park. Read More
